propel.core.functional.projections

Class Files

  • java.lang.Object
    • propel.core.functional.projections.Files

  • public final class Files
extends java.lang.Object
    Some common, re-usable projections for file manipulation

    • Method Detail

      • appendToFile

        public static void appendToFile(java.io.File _file,
                java.lang.String _text)
        Action that appends some text data to a file. No EOL character is appended, just the given text.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - An argument is out of range
        IOException - An I/O error occurs
        FileNotFoundException - The file specified is a directory, or it does not exist and cannot be created, or cannot be appended to.
        java.lang.SecurityException - Access to filesystem is denied by a SecurityManager

      • appendLineToFile

        public static void appendLineToFile(java.io.File _file,
                    java.lang.String _text)
        Action that appends some text data to a file. The current operating system EOL character is appended at the end of the given text.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - An argument is out of range
        IOException - An I/O error occurs
        FileNotFoundException - The file specified is a directory, or it does not exist and cannot be created, or cannot be appended to.
        java.lang.SecurityException - Access to filesystem is denied by a SecurityManager

      • copyFile

        public static void copyFile(java.io.File _srcFile,
            java.lang.String _destFilePath)
        Action that copies a file from an absolute file path to another
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        IOException - An I/O error occurs
        FileNotFoundException - The file specified is a directory, it does not exist or cannot be read/created.
        java.lang.SecurityException - Access to filesystem is denied by a SecurityManager

      • deleteFile

        public static void deleteFile(java.io.File _file)
        Action that deletes a file from an absolute file path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        IOException - An I/O error occurs
        FileNotFoundException - The file was a directory
        java.lang.SecurityException - Access to filesystem is denied by a SecurityManager

      • deleteDirectory

        public static void deleteDirectory(java.io.File _dir)
        Action that deletes a directory from an absolute file path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        IOException - An I/O error occurs
        FileNotFoundException - The file was not a directory
        java.lang.SecurityException - Access to filesystem is denied by a SecurityManager

      • deleteDirectoryRecursive

        public static void deleteDirectoryRecursive(java.io.File _dir)
        Action that deletes a directory tree from an absolute file path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        IOException - An I/O error occurs
        FileNotFoundException - The file was not a directory
        java.lang.SecurityException - Access to filesystem is denied by a SecurityManager

      • getAbsolutePath

        public static java.lang.String getAbsolutePath(java.io.File file)
        Returns the absolute path of the file
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        java.lang.SecurityException - If a required system property value cannot be accessed

      • getExtension

        Throws:

      • moveFile

        public static void moveFile(java.io.File _srcFile,
            java.lang.String _destFilePath)
        Action that moves a file from an absolute file path to another
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - An argument is null
        IOException - An I/O error occurs
        FileNotFoundException - The file specified is a directory, it does not exist or cannot be read/created.
        java.lang.SecurityException - Access to filesystem is denied by a SecurityManager

      • tryCopyFile

        public static void tryCopyFile(java.io.File _srcFile,
               java.lang.String _destFilePath)
        Action that copies a file from an absolute file path to another. No exception is thrown under any circumstance.

      • tryDeleteFile

        public static void tryDeleteFile(java.io.File _file)
        Action that deletes a file from an absolute file path. No exception is thrown under any circumstance.

      • tryDeleteDirectory

        public static void tryDeleteDirectory(java.io.File _dir)
        Action that deletes a directory from an absolute file path. No exception is thrown under any circumstance.

      • tryDeleteDirectoryRecursive

        public static void tryDeleteDirectoryRecursive(java.io.File _dir)
        Action that deletes a directory tree from an absolute file path. No exception is thrown under any circumstance.

      • tryMoveFile

        public static void tryMoveFile(java.io.File _srcFile,
               java.lang.String _destFilePath)
        Action that moves a file from one absolute file path to another. No exception is thrown under any circumstance.
